title: Olympic runner reacts to Trump tweet
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper speaks with Olympic runner, Kara Goucher, whose grandfather is fighting Covid-19. Watch "Full Circle" every Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 6p E.T.

title: Michelle Obama's blunt message about Trump
description: Former first lady Michelle Obama is making her closing message to Americans in a campaign video released less than one month before Election Day, imploring voters to "vote for Joe Biden like your lives depend on it."

title: Three years later, Facebook says it will ban QAnon
description: Facebook said Thursday it will ban any pages, groups, and Instagram accounts representing the conspiracy theory QAnon from its platform.

title: Trump ends stimulus talks with Democrats
description:
• Stocks immediately tank after Trump tweet
• How Trump's decision affects Americans
• Analysis: Trump is losing by 16 in a new CNN poll. That's not the worst news

title: How Fox News and Trump are spinning lethality of Covid-19
description: CNN's Brianna Keilar discusses how President Trump and Fox News are dangerously spinning the lethality of Covid-19 and selling Trump's coronavirus infection as "the sacrifice of a true leader."

title: Trump has personally pressured drug company CEOs repeatedly to speed vaccine
Michelle Obama slams Trump in closing campaign message
description: Former first lady Michelle Obama made her closing message to Americans in a campaign video released less than a month before Election Day, saying President Donald Trump and his allies are "stoking fears about Black and Brown Americans" to win an election and calling the President's actions "morally wrong" and "racist."

title: China's global reputation plunges in the wake of coronavirus pandemic
description: Global perceptions of China have turned increasingly negative in recent months, according to a new survey released by Pew Research on Tuesday, with the majority of countries polled saying that Beijing has done a bad job of handling the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Italian islands become 'sex pilgrimage' sites
description: They're pristine, wild and extremely hot -- and not just because of the high temperature and the stunning volcanic landscape with constant little eruptions.

title: CNN's Chris Cuomo: This president is a walking 'lie-ability'
description: CNN's Chris Cuomo calls out President Donald Trump for returning to the White house just days after starting treatment at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center.

title: Nobel Prize in Physics awarded for black hole discoveries
description: The 2020 Nobel Prize in Physics has been awarded for discoveries about black holes, with one half going to Roger Penrose and the other half jointly to Reinhard Genzel and Andrea Ghez.

title: Who is winning the US election money race?
description: See which candidate has the largest sum of total contributions, including personal contributions, in the 2020 presidential election.​

title: Olympic high jumper pressured to 'perform better' and lose a few pounds
description: The rejection was brutal. At the age of 16, Priscilla Frederick-Loomis attended a model agency casting session in New York City where she was told that she was "too heavy."

title: Muslim fans called out Rihanna for using song with sacred Islamic verses during lingerie fashion show
description: Rihanna ignited backlash this week after Muslim fans called her out for using a song that included sacred Islamic verses during her second Savage x Fenty lingerie fashion show.

title: How Trump and Biden differ in policy towards Saudi Arabia
description: President Donald Trump and Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden vary drastically in their foreign policy towards Saudi Arabia. While Trump views the kingdom as a key ally, Biden has pledged to reassess US-Saudi relations. CNN's Becky Anderson explains.

title: Trump tweets about campaign trail ahead of departure
There's 14 million metric tons of microplastics sitting on the seafloor, study finds
description: It is well documented that large quantities of plastic enters the oceans every year, polluting the seas, littering beaches and endangering wildlife. And that plastic pollution has been found even in the most remote regions of Earth, such as Antarctica or in the deepest parts of our oceans.

title: Opinion: Biden checkmates Trump on Covid
description: A little more than an hour after President Trump, infected with the coronavirus, made a rash and reckless return to the White House, Democratic challenger Joe Biden made clear at a televised NBC town hall why he is leading Trump in every national poll and in most top battleground states as well.

title: Trump mounts bizarre and misleading White House return
description: A strongly medicated President Donald Trump bolted from his VIP hospital bubble Monday, staging a bizarre White House comeback that included an irresponsible mask removal and a reckless pronouncement there is nothing to fear from Covid-19, which has already killed 210,000 Americans.

title: Post-election protests put Kyrgyzstan on brink of revolt
description: People protesting the results of a parliamentary election in Kyrgyzstan broke into government and security headquarters early on Tuesday and freed a former president from custody, local news websites said.

title: 'The Blacklist' and 'Twin Peaks' actor Clark Middleton dies at 63
description: Actor, director and producer Clark Middleton has died, his wife Elissa confirmed in social media posts on Monday. He was 63.

title: Situation in West Wing: Trump's reckless return met with a changed White House
description: President Donald Trump may be eagerly seeking a return to normal after three nights in the hospital. But the White House he arrived home to Monday with dramatic and reckless flourish has changed drastically since he was airlifted off the South Lawn at the end of last week.

title: Biden says Trump is 'responsible' for getting coronavirus
description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden said Monday night that President Donald Trump is responsible for contracting coronavirus, faulting Trump for failing to wear masks and follow social distancing guidelines.

title: This 'flawless' diamond's opening bid at auction was 13 cents
description: On Monday evening an exceptionally rare 102.39-carat diamond made auction history as the first gem of its quality to be sold without a reserve.

title: TikTok's US ban is on hold. What comes next?
description: TikTok averted a ban in the United States last week when a federal judge ruled that Washington couldn't block it from app stores just yet.

title: A robot suitcase could replace canes and guide dogs for blind people
description: Negotiating an airport with its labyrinthine corridors, endless escalators and myriad gates is never easy. Now imagine doing it if you were blind.

title: Oversized hospital bill paintings sold to pay off medical debts
description: An art collective has come up with a novel way of paying off three people's medical debt: turning their hospital bills into huge paintings and selling them to collectors for thousands of dollars.

title: Fauci explains how he sees Thanksgiving holiday playing out
description: Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases Dr. Anthony Fauci tells CNN's Chris Cuomo how he sees the Thanksgiving holiday playing out during the coronavirus pandemic, and how Americans can stay safe.

title: See soap opera actor's unusual kiss
description: During the coronavirus pandemic, television shows are having to get creative to keep their actors safe. CNN's Jeanne Moos shows how one soap opera developed an unusual safety protocol.

title: Her dad died of Covid-19. She says Trump is 'most dangerous person in the world'
description: Kristin Urquiza's father died of coronavirus after following President Donald Trump's guidance on the disease. See her reaction as Trump returns to the White House after spending 72 hours at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center and stages a reckless departure from the hospital.

title: US revokes visa of Ukrainian Giuliani ally
description: The US State Department revoked the visa of a former Ukrainian diplomat who has worked with Republicans to spread baseless conspiracy theories about the Biden family and foreign meddling in 2016, American and Ukrainian officials told CNN on Monday.

title: Delta rapidly strengthens to a hurricane, will threaten Gulf Coast
description: Tropical Storm Delta formed in the Caribbean early Monday and has rapidly strengthened to a Category 1 hurricane with winds of 75 mph. Hurricane Delta is on track to impact the central Gulf Coast late this week.

title: Infected Trump re-shoots entrance into White House with camera crew
description: CNN's Kaitlan Collins reports that President Trump was seen reshooting his entrance into the White House without a mask after returning from Walter Reed medical center where he was treated for coronavirus.

title: John McAfee indicted for tax evasion, arrested in Spain
description: John McAfee, the antivirus software magnate and former Libertarian presidential candidate, has been indicted for tax evasion.
